subject: VA Java import
msgSnippet: We regularly build VA Java versions of JUnit (.dat and .pr files) for our own internal purposes. I d be happy to make that publicly downloadable, if anyone s
messageBody:
We regularly build VA Java versions of JUnit (.dat and .pr files) for our
own internal purposes. I'd be happy to make that publicly downloadable, if
anyone's interested. If so, where would be a good place to link to it from?

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Mike Silverstein
SilverMark, Inc.
The object testing company
http://www.silvermark.com

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jason Rogers [mailto:jason.rogers@...]
> Sent: Monday, August 27, 2001 7:20 AM
> To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [junit] Re: ClassNotFoundException
>
>
> We are running 3.5.2...
>
> Are you still trying to run with the JUnit jar? If so, move away
> from that.
> Import the source into VAJ in a new project called JUnit, or
> whatever suits
> your fancy.
